TempStable 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • my-vignette
  • Changelog

    Function to generate random variates of the TSS distribution.

    rTSS.Rd

    Generates n random numbers distributed according of the tempered stable subordinator distribution.

    rTSS(
  n,
  alpha = NULL,
  delta = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  theta = NULL,
  method = "AR",
  k = 10000
)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size (integer).

    alpha

    Stability parameter. A real number between 0 and 1.

    delta

    Scale parameter. A real number > 0.

    lambda

    Tempering parameter. A real number > 0.

    theta

    Parameters stacked as a vector.

    method

    A String. Either "AR" or "SR".

    k

    integer: the level of truncation, if method == "SR". 10000 by default.

    Value

    Generates n random numbers.

    Details

    theta denotes the parameter vector (alpha, delta, lambda). Either provide the parameters alpha, delta, lambda individually OR provide theta. "AR" stands for the Acceptance-Rejection Method and "SR" for a truncated infinite shot noise series representation. "AR" is the standard method used. For more details, see references.

    References

    Massing, Till (2022), 'Parametric Estimation of Tempered Stable Laws'

    Kawai, R & Masuda, H (2011), 'On simulation of tempered stable random variates' doi:10.1016/j.cam.2010.12.014

    Examples

    rTSS(100,0.5,1,1)
#>   [1] 1.8098335 1.7456654 0.9851650 3.4152722 1.1078734 0.8789195 1.6568377
#>   [8] 1.5258713 1.6729084 1.4936860 1.0868637 3.6255495 2.4024515 1.4088672
#>  [15] 1.8962104 2.2434816 1.9203924 1.5128202 0.7970817 1.0128738 0.4259809
#>  [22] 2.1800696 3.4384610 2.6021649 1.6721887 1.0855649 0.8059918 1.0656934
#>  [29] 1.1156306 0.7241432 0.6479879 1.0911596 1.0239076 1.1522545 0.8414924
#>  [36] 1.1306866 1.7298121 2.7937940 1.3785883 1.5162381 3.2882642 1.1738800
#>  [43] 3.0281149 5.5781730 1.0905655 0.9699351 0.7291611 0.9808815 1.2466741
#>  [50] 1.6142413 1.7463204 1.7458455 1.1134241 1.8382268 1.3739105 1.3693058
#>  [57] 1.5083588 0.7918593 1.6356908 1.1648094 0.7245895 0.4609151 1.5401162
#>  [64] 1.9190627 1.4484543 1.4960687 1.6066605 1.5882052 1.7832864 1.7457059

#>  [92] 1.1007342 1.2742012 1.0843209 1.5356944 3.1439477 1.1540613 3.1963083
#>  [99] 2.8325835 0.9517232
